tracks.text: Title card depicting wire cutters. Text, Handyman Saito in another world
Characters squeezes together. Text, Marriage Consultancy in Another World
Next to Maevena, a woman can be seen through a window. She talks to a man in armor.
Lafa drags Saito back to the window
She drags him away in a headlock
Characters blow kisses. Text, Temptation of the Succubus
A naked, green woman with long pink hair floats above the party. She flaps long, bat wings. She smiles.
Saito stares
He drops his torch and shuffles towards her, hearts in his eyes
Text, Status: Charmed
He shuffles forward, blushing. She smiles and lowers to the ground, her hands outstretched.
Saito and the succubus hold hands
Raelza charges the succubus and swings her sword. The succubus flies away,
The succubus darts around fearfully.
Raelza swings. Succubus dodges. The sword leaves a deep gash in the wall.
Lafa and Morlock watch
The succubus flies off
Saito sees Raelza in a pink haze. He shuffles towards her.
He gets closer. Raelza backs up. He follows.
She backs up to a wall. He places a hand against the wall and leans in close
Saito picks up the torch, then looks around.
Raelza walks away
Characters spark. Text, A Trap where you get hit with lightning if you're wearing metal armor
He holds his work suit. He wears only boxers
Raelza puts on the loose fitting worksuit
Morlock holds the armor
He carries armor
Text, Morlock instantly forgets how the trap works
Characters grow. Text, Power Wizard
An elderly man stands. He's bald, with bushy white eyebrows and a long, white beard. He carries a 20 foot long staff that forms a large club at one end and a tapered point at the other.
Text, A magician carrying a staff made from the World Tree. It was far too large to be called (abbr.)
The magician flicks his wrist. A cyclops falls.
In a dense forest, the magician sees 3 hob goblins. The wield weapons. The magician looks around and shifts his staff. It hits against trees.
Text, when he can't swing his staff...
The magician runs. The hob goblins eyes roll back. He skewers the 3 on the pointed end of the staff.
Characters appear. Text, A Ninja who possesses an amazing special skill
A man with a sword walks across an arid plain.
A foot steps on the swordsman's shadow
The swordsman stands, frozen, his eyes wide. The ninja cuts an X across the man.
The ninja approaches a woman with long, black hair wearing a robe.
He steps on the woman's shadow, and his foot sinks into emptiness.
He struggles as he sinks to his torso. He looks up, and the woman turns around and eyes him.
The ninja sinks away. The witch keeps walking.
The sun shines over the sky. Day turns to night to day over and over. The ninja stands with a 5 eyed demon and a 2 eyed winged demon.
The witch turns to look at him and smiles.
The demons hold up their hands and emit a beam of light.
He lifts a double bladed sword
He pulls down his mask
and kisses the witch
The demons gape
Text, The ninja has fallen in love with the witch
Characters sparkle. Text, The kingdom's officially recognized hero's party
The committee chair stands.
Mechanic gives a thumbs up. Above him, a sword is stuck through a platform. A sign nearby reads, Only the hero can draw this sword

Kai, a 20 something with short blue hair and blue eyes, approaches the sword. The mechanic looks through a crack to see Kai's face. Kai smiles and reaches down, grasping the sword. A crowd of people gather, their hands clasped.
Kai pulls. The mechanic pushes a lever. Kai draws the sword.
Text, The moment the Hero was born
Committee
Text, and thus, an idol magician was born
Monpui
Text, the priest has connections
A HeroTube stream. Viewer counts grow. Users comment.
Kai and Rychee interlock their limbs, partially off screen. Some comments include "Boobs!" and "slut"
Text, it was all a plot by Monpui to get revenge for the daily mistreatment he suffered
Characters poof. Text, The Locked Book of Magic
He eyes a tome wrapped in chains with a padlock.
He opens the book. It's hollowed out. He steps back.
A phallic object is censored. Text, This is a mushroom!!
Text, The addictive properties of this mushroom were so strong that later it became a regulated substance
Characters fall apart. Text, A favorite item brought from the modern world breaks
Saito pulls a black strand taut. He squeezes wire cutters.
A jaw breaks off
Text, The handyman from another world's unlocking skills are unparalleled!
Saito blinks
Saito looks down, brow furrowed. Later, a table hosts dishes of fish, meat, and bread
Lafa sleeps on the blacksmith's head
Saito picks up a blanket and drapes it over her
Characters shiver. Text, Catching a cold in another world
Text, However, He helps when Morlock forgets his incantations.
He protects Lafanpan
He readies reserve weapons for Raelza. The various forms of support that handyman Saitou provides on the battlefield are very helpful
In his sick bed, Saito eats orange slices.
She carries Morlock and Lafa, both passed out. Text, Without Saito, the party could no longer function.
Characters drop in. Text, When he arrived in another world
He walks in front of a truck. White out. Saito drops from a ceiling into Raelza's bed
Raelza looks at Saito. She brandishes a knife. He hides behind a chair.
Raelza's in the window
Raelza leaps back
Raelza blushes. Lafa stares.
Characters hinge open. Door to the depths.
Saito's party eats in a pub
Characters move around. Text, Government managed Great Labyrinth
Her coin is added to a handful of others in a chest
They walk through caves
They rest and drink water
They descend
A metal object moves across the floor
He runs and leaps
A roomba
The roomba shakes free of his hands and scurries across the cave floor into a small crack in the wall. It disappears into the darkness. Saito gapes
He puts his hand on a vertical seam
Morlock puts his hand on the rock and it glows
Morlock's hand glows. The rock shimmers. Blue designs appear across the rock.
A light runs up the vertical seam, and the halves of the rock slide away
Text, For the first time in several decades, the great labyrinth has expanded
The group stare down a long corridor
Wind rushes past them, filling the passage
Text, The area was named "Saito's Tunnel"
Adventurers from all over the kingdom began to gather
An entry fee coin is added to a full chest. An adventurer walks forward, and a long line moves up. Saito and party watch the crowded entry.
Saito stares. Raelza glances at him.
The dwarf stares. The axe-wielding girl and the burly man stare.
The elf and priest girls stare.
The old man with the giant staff stare.
The hero's party stare.
Text, The curtain rises on a new age of exploration
Credits roll
